content.query:
---
--https://raysynapsemgdvnetdlacct.dfs.core.windows.net/raysynapsemgdvnetdlacctfs
-- ALL BELOW DOESN'T WORK. DML is not supported in external tables.

INSERT INTO OPENROWSET(
    BULK '/DCC/TestCSV2.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'CannabisTax',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n',
    FIRSTROW = 2
) 

SELECT *
FROM [dbo].[myView]

INSERT INTO dbo.myView
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
   BULK 'https://raysynapsemgdvnetdlacct.dfs.core.windows.net/raysynapsemgdvnetdlacctfs/DCC/tests.csv'
   --FORMATFILE = 'C:\MyFolder\MyFormatFile.fmt'
) AS DataFile;


BULK INSERT dbo.myView
FROM 'https://raysynapsemgdvnetdlacct.dfs.core.windows.net/raysynapsemgdvnetdlacctfs/DCC/TestCSV2.csv'
WITH (
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    FIRSTROW = 2,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
);


insert into dbo.myView values()
